desc: Love travel? Love organised travel? Midnight Crusade offers you the perfect travel accessories that will get you through all of your travels and also keep you organised along the way! From passport wallets to backpacks, travel bottles and packing cubes, all products are cruelty free and come with a 12 month warranty.

layout.text: Time to update your passport wallet?
The Everything Travel Wallet can fit up to 6 passports, sim cards and more
